interestingcomments.content: I always cut off feet in 35mm frame on M6 /!/ Hello, whenever I compose on the 35mm framelines on my M6, I cut off the feet in horizontal and vertical orientation. I could swear that the feet are included within the frame and the rangefinder is perfectly adjusted. Any suggestions?
